text.section: Subject to the notice and hearing provisions of Title 10, Subtitle 2 of the State Government Article, the Secretary may bring a civil administrative action against a person that violates § 12.5-505(a) of this subtitle.

After a hearing, if the Secretary finds that a person has violated § 12.5-505(a) of this subtitle, the Secretary may:
order the person to cease and desist from unlawful practice; and
impose a civil penalty not exceeding $100 for each day of unlawful practice.
Any person aggrieved by a decision and order of the Secretary under this section may take an appeal as allowed in Title 10, Subtitle 2 of the State Government Article.
